column3: then target 1 face-up monster you control; it gains ATK equal to the deficit between your current LP and 4000 until the end of your opponent's turn. You can only activate 1 "Soul Strike" per turn.$$$Activates upon attack declaration$Activation requirement/Effect/Condition$
